sentences: Milošević was born in Prokuplje, Kingdom of Yugoslavia, now Serbia.
He completed undergraduate and graduate studies of classical music at the Academy of Music in Belgrade, where he studied with Bruno Brun.
He was a member of the Association of Musical Artists of Serbia and was the second clarinetist of the Belgrade Philharmonic Orchestra.
Božidar Milošević's son, Milan Milošević, is also a clarinetist; he lives and works in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
